resources.string: "Hey, I found this app called Instaq. It helped me finding the most relevant instagram hashtags for my photos. Let it help you, too. It\'s free :)\n\nhttp://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.innocliq.instaq"
"Any improvement ideas? Want to give other people some good advices? Let us know."
"Keep in mind that Google takes 30 %% off every transaction."
"Buy photos to get uncensored hashtag results. All packages include an lifelong unlimited history."
"Thanks for the following software to be open source :)"
"Christan und Paul from Germany for kickstarting this Idea"
"Nazar Nastin from Ukraine for UI/UX Design"
"Jabub Jiricka from Czech Republic for Frontend UI Development"
"Dario D. Müller from Germany for Management and Development"

"Thank you for using Instaq.

We believe in improving the process of choosing Instagram hashtags. To bring the same quality of hashtags used by influencer agengies to everyone, we want to build Instaq empowering with powerful algorithms to analyze Instagram's latest, most successful content and build a great User Experience around it.

Do you agree with our vision? Let us build this dream together. Contribute to Instaq by giving feedback for hashtags or ask for features or improvements."

"We wish you had a great experience. To build an ever better experience, we want to include you in the process of making it. If you like Instaq, you can present your support by sharing your insights with us, ask for a feature or write us an e-mail to instaq@innocliq.me."
"Engagement increases with each hashtag as you go up to 11"
"30%% of users bought a product they discovered on Instagram"
"There are 400 million users watching Stories on a daily basis"
"60%% of the top brands use the same filter for every post"
"Images that have blue as the dominant color get 24 %% more likes than images with red as the dominant color"
"Images with more background space (or negative or white space) get 29 %% more likes"
"Images with texture have a 79%% higher engagement rates in likes compared to low texture"
"Images with a single dominant hue has best results"
"Posts containing or featuring User-generated content has a 4.5%% higher conversion rate than non-UGC posts."
"Brands post an average of 27.9x per month, this means almost every day"
"1.1 billion people use Instagram. 500 million of them use Instagram every day"
"Posts with a location receive 79%% more engagement"
"Posts that include another handle gain 56%% more engagement"
"Wednesday 5 pm is the best time to post a photo"
"The most popular hashtags on Instagram are #Love, #Instagood, #Me, #Cute, and #Follow"
"Videos get 2 times the engagement compared to photos"
"17%% of teens say Instagram is the most important social media site"
"38%% of female internet users use Instagram and 26%% of male internet users use Instagram"
"Posts with at least one hashtag reach average 12.6 %% more engagement"
"32%% of all Internet users are on Instagram"
"Around 95 million photos will be uploaded every a single day"
"Let Instaq help you finding Instagram\'s most relevant hashtags for this wonderful photo"
